headline: Brown & Brown, Inc. (BRO): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Brown & Brown, Inc. on FluentInquality’s Substack. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on BRO. Brown & Brown, Inc.’s share was trading at $ 108.29 as of 19th June. BRO’s trailing and forward P/E ratios were 30.16 and 25.77, respectively, according to Yahoo Finance. Brown & […]

headline: Stewart Investors Identifies Six Global Companies Advancing Health Beyond Pharma
summary: While pharmaceutical drug pricing is making headlines amid President Trump's proposal to benchmark U.S. retail drug costs to international standards, less attention is being paid to attractive, albeit less-glamorous investment areas in the global health ecosystem, according to Stewart Investors, a long-only active global equity specialist.
